resources.string: Thank you for using the Canvass App, please enter your name to continue.
Why do we ask for this information?

By supplying your name and address we will be able to set contact preferences for you. We will abide by this and the flag will only be changed against your name if you expressly request it. Whether it\'s "Please don't bother me again" in which case we will know not to knock your door or deliver leaflets to your address. The survey will also give you the option to receive newsletters from us or Join the Group.

We will not share your data with any other groups or organisations. We will not sell your data under any circumstances. Any personal data supplied by you will only be used by us to set your preferences.
How did you vote in the 2014 independence referendum?
Do you know how you will vote in the next independence referendum?
How did you vote in the Brexit referendum?
When do you think another referendum should be called?
When do you think another referendum should be called?
Would you consider joining Yes Ross | Sutherland?
This page gives you the option to delete the main collected data file, use this after email is confirmed sent, your now ready to start a fresh canvass session.
When you email a data file the file is automatically backed up, delete this backup file when you are confident your data has been received and saved elsewhere.
Would you like to receive occasional newsletters from ***?
By checking this box YES Ross|Sutherland will not contact you again unless by your request. We will not call or leaflet your door.
Thank you, your results have been saved.

Here you can create a new Campaign, set the email recipient for results and up to five questions.
Begin by creating a name for the Campaign.
By supplying an email address your membership will be created, please look out for an email to confirm membership and reset password. If you do not see an email please check your spam or junk folder.
To setup your group on the app simply complete the name of your group and an email address to forward results to.
